verses.verse: <S%H8104>Preserve<s%> <S%H410>me<s%>, O God: for in you do I put my <S%H2620>trust<s%>.
O my <S%H559>soul<s%>, you have said unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, You are my <S%H136>Lord<s%>: my goodness extends not to <S%H2896>you<s%>;
But to the <S%H6918>saints<s%> <S%H1992>that<s%> are in the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and to the <S%H117>excellent<s%>, in whom is all my <S%H2656>delight<s%>.

Their <S%H6094>sorrows<s%> shall be <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> that <S%H4116>hasten<s%> after <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H5262>god<s%>: their drink offerings of <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I not <S%H5258>offer<s%>, <S%H1077>nor<s%> take <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H8034>names<s%> into my <S%H8193>lips<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is the <S%H4490>portion<s%> of my <S%H2506>inheritance<s%> and of my <S%H3563>cup<s%>: you <S%H8551>maintain<s%> my <S%H1486>lot<s%>.
The <S%H2256>lines<s%> are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> unto me in <S%H5273>pleasant<s%> <S%H8231>places<s%>; Yes, I have a good <S%H5159>heritage<s%>.
I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, who has given me <S%H3289>counsel<s%>: my <S%H3629>minds<s%> also <S%H3256>instruct<s%> me in the night <S%H3915>seasons<s%>.
I have <S%H7737>set<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8548>always<s%> before <S%H3225>me<s%>: because he is at my right hand, I shall not be <S%H4131>moved<s%>.
Therefore my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H8055>glad<s%>, and my <S%H3519>glory<s%> <S%H1523>rejoices<s%>: my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> also shall <S%H7931>rest<s%> in <S%H983>hope<s%>.
For you will not <S%H5800>leave<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> in <S%H7585>hell<s%>; neither will you <S%H5414>allow<s%> your Holy <S%H2623>One<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7845>corruption<s%>.

You will <S%H3045>show<s%> me the <S%H734>path<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>: in your <S%H6440>presence<s%> is <S%H7648>fullness<s%> of <S%H8057>joy<s%>; at your right <S%H3225>hand<s%> there are <S%H5273>pleasures<s%> for <S%H5331>evermore<s%>.
